Swain.name: SwainБ
Swain.title: Ббthe Master TacticianбБ
Swain.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъThe earliest account of Swain's existence comes from a Noxian infirmary doctor's notes. According to them, Swain limped into the ward without cry or complaint; his right leg was snapped in half, with bone protruding from the skin. A small, scowling bird seemed affixed to his shoulder. The doctor gawked in horror as the young adolescent answered questions about his health and age with a calm, even stare. Even behind the echoing crack as the sand counterweights reset his tibia, Swain's measuring gaze never flickered, nor did his eyes twitch from the pop of his fibula. He refused the doctor's recommendation of magical treatment for the leg's inoperable damage, requesting only a spare crutch before shuffling away. He next surfaced in documents from the Noxian military, although it is evident that they are incomplete. Normally a crippled boy would be turned away in shame from Noxus' proud legion, but the records indicate his first designation was that of a ranking officer.ъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШThe men who've served under him (and survived) have remained in his charge with unshakable faith and loyalty. He leapt through the High Command's hierarchy, often ascending when superiors requested demotions to join his unit. A cunning strategist, Swain was decorated after every battle he fought, regularly hobbling in contemplation at the front of the assault. His rise to power seemed unceasing until he was suddenly relegated to inactive status prior to the Ionian Invasion - a bewildering decision which reeked of bureaucratic subversion. If Swain was upset by the events which unfolded, he never belied it. His face was so implacable that it was popularly rumored to be a mask, disguising something utterly inhuman beneath. More controversy surrounded the bird that never left his shoulder, whose name he whispered only to it. When Demacia escalated its presence in the League, Swain was immediately returned to active duty.ШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖж''If you haven't yet lost the ability to ask, you may not yet ask for relief.''жЖдДгГбБ
-SwainБ
Swain.blurb: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъThe earliest account of Swain's existence comes from a Noxian infirmary doctor's notes. According to them, Swain limped into the ward without cry or ...
allytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзIf you're having trouble rooting an enemy with Nevermove, try using Decrepify to slow them down first.зЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцWhile laning, try to gauge the strength of your opponents to determine the right balance of aggression with Ravenous Flock. If they're stronger, it might be more beneficial to stay back and cast Nevermove or Torment.ЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдЖжЗSwain can easily disable a single attacker. Coordinate with your allies when ganking him.ЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФHigh mobility counters all of Swain's basic abilities: moving away from the Raven will break the slow, it is easier to dodge Nevermove, and you're able to escape focus fire while Tormented.ФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БDecrepifyБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиSwain sets his raven to cripple an enemy. Over the next three seconds, the target takes damage over time and is slowed.иИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиSwain afflicts his target, dealing damage to them over time and causing them to take increased damage from Swain's attacks.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГSwain afflicts his target for ГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДдЖ magic damage over 4 seconds. During this affliction, the target takes ЖдДгГбБ{{ e2 }}БбГг% increased damage from Swain's attacks.гГбБ

spells.name: БбRavenous FlockБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦSwain inspires dread in his enemies by temporarily taking the form of a raven. During this time ravens strike out at up to 3 nearby enemies. Each raven deals damage and heals Swain for half of the damage dealt.ЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БToggle: ББбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлSwain transforms into the form of a raven. During this time, up to 3 lesser ravens strike out at nearby enemies each second, prioritizing champions. Each raven deals ПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГг magic damage and heals Swain for ГбБ{{ e3 }}БбГг% of the damage dealt against champions, and ДгГбБ{{ e5 }}Бб% against minions.бБ

БбГгДThe cost to sustain Ravenous Flock increases by ДгГбБ{{ e4 }}Бб mana each second.бБ
